abstract: The Teen Choice Awards will be shown Monday at 8 p.m. on Fox.
snippet: The Teen Choice Awards will be shown Monday at 8 p.m. on Fox.
lead_paragraph: Miley Cyrus, the star of the Disney Channel’s “Hannah Montana,” is hosting the 10th annual Teen Choice Awards, “which will shower celebrities with dozens of surfboard trophies in film, TV, music, sports and fashion categories,” the Associated Press reports.
